ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think this whole site is a parody.  If you read the other articles below, you ll see some very weird stuff, and a lot of pics look like they were swiped
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "mordere" <mordere@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Not EQ related but still.... (Introduction too)
>Date: Sun, 4 Jul 1999 23:57:50 -0700
>
>From: "mordere" <mordere@...>
>
>Hello all,
> I do believe I finally have the proof which tells us that *yes*
>Christians are insane.
>
>http://www.erols.com/oddities-inc/news0899/jar.html
>

I think this whole site is a parody. If you read the other articles below,
you'll see some very weird stuff, and a lot of pics look like they were
swiped from somewhere. Or read the letter columnist... It might seem
awfully weird, but I've seen a lot of parody sites that try to deal with a
certain issue, like www.gaaygamer.com being a parody of www.grrlgamer.com

I know what you mean though, a lot of religious freaks hate gays. But the
bottom line is people are just weird in general.
